description: Update LaunchAgentManager.swift to use Bundle.main.bundleIdentifier instead of hardcoded bundle IDs. This ensures the configuration is tied to the current app's bundle ID.
Update GatewayDiscoveryModel.swift to use dynamic logger subsystem and dispatch queue labels derived from the bundle identifier.
Modify the package-mac-app.sh script to load environment variables from the .env file if it exists, allowing configuration of BUNDLE_ID.
Update apps/ios/project.yml to use environment variables for bundleIdPrefix, enabling configuration via .env or CI.
Add OPENCLAW_BUNDLE_PREFIX and BUNDLE_ID examples to .env.example.
